text: Honey to the B is the first album by pop singer Billie Piper, released in 1998 (see 1998 in music). Billie (she was known at the time only by her first name) was the first British female singer to have a first single start at #1 on the UK pop charts. == UK track listing == # "Because We Want To" (Marr/Page/Rambo/Richmond) - 3:48 # "Girlfriend" (Rambo/Richmond) - 3:50 # "Officially Yours" (Mitra) - 3:26 # "She Wants You" (Laws/Sheyne) - 3:38 # "Love Groove" (Marr/Page/Piper) - 4:29 # "Party on the Phone" (Marr/Page) - 4:14 # "Saying I'm Sorry Now" (Rambo/Richmond) - 4:00 # "You've Got It" (Green/McLaughlin) - 3:43 # "I Dream" (Marr/Page) - 5:33 # "Honey to the Bee" (Marr/Page) - 5:03 # "Whatcha Gonna Do" (Rambo/Richmond) - 4:33 # "Don't Forget to Remember" (Marr/Page) - 4:47 Category:1998 albums Category:Billie Piper albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop albums Category:Virgin Records albums
title: Honey to the B
